description.value: The blackfrost dead fixes its terrifying gaze on a creature within 60 feet. The creature takes @Damage[1d4[mental]] per level of the blackfrost dead (minimum 2d4), with a @Check[type:will|dc:|basic:true] save. On a critical failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.
